titleStmt.title: A description of a great sea-storm, that happened to some ships in the Gulph of Florida, in September last; / drawn up by one of the company, and sent to his friend at London.
titleStmt.author: One of the company.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Milbourn, for Dorman Newman, at the King]'s Armes in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "The blustring winds are husht into a calme ..."
Imperfect: cropped at foot with partial loss of imprint; portion of imprint suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
